{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3653617,"name":"","username":"Kully","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kully/{size}/264955_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-15T10:10:37.137Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone!

I‚Äôm excited to share a new tool I‚Äôve been working on:
KoalaLogüê® ‚Äî an annotation-based logging library for FTC that produces .wpilog files fully compatible with AdvantageScope.

I‚Äôd really appreciate if you could test it out, report any bugs you encounter, and share your thoughts on how we can improve it. Your feedback means a lot and will help make this tool even better for the FTC community!

What It Does

This tool allows FTC teams to:

  • Automatically log telemetry using @AutoLog annotations
  • Visualize logs in AdvantageScope (great for tuning, debugging, and match analysis)
  • Post live data to FTC Dashboard
  • Use manual logging for full control when needed
  • Pull .wpilog files off the robot with prebuilt EXEs (via ADB)

How to Use It

Full setup and usage instructions are available in the wiki:

Wiki Overview

  • How to Add to Your FTC Project
  • How to Use in Your Code
  • How to Get the Log

Why Use This?

Logging things like elevator height, setpoints, PID outputs, and autonomous states into AdvantageScope makes debugging and tuning much easier‚Äîespecially during autonomous development or complex teleop behavior.

I‚Äôd love to hear what you think ‚Äî please try out KoalaLog, let me know if you run into any issues, and feel free to suggest improvements or contribute!

Koala Log has just had its first official release following major refactoring and some minor (but worthwhile) breaking changes. If you‚Äôve previously tried Koala Log, now‚Äôs the time to revisit the updated wiki for the latest usage instructions.

If you haven‚Äôt checked it out yet, this is the perfect opportunity to try the best logger currently available for FTC.
check
it
out

New Features

We‚Äôre excited to announce that Koala Log now includes built-in support for logging Pose2d, Translation2d, and Rotation2d . This makes it significantly easier to record and visualize your robot‚Äôs movement and orientation throughout a match.

These updates enable seamless integration with AdvantageScope, allowing you to display your robot‚Äôs position directly on field images or even in the 3D field view.

Check out the wiki and start logging smarter!
